metadata.title: Google Drive Permissions Manager
metadata.description: Manage and control permissions for your Google Drive files and folders with ease.

hero.description: Visualize, manage, and audit file permissions across your entire Google Drive. Keep your data secure and organized with our powerful permission management tool.
hero.tagline: Free to use • No credit card required • Privacy-focused

features.heading: Everything You Need to Manage Permissions

completeMapping.title: Complete File Mapping
completeMapping.description: Automatically scan and map your entire Google Drive structure, including all files, folders, and their associated permissions.

permissionControl.title: Permission Control
permissionControl.description: Add or remove access for specific users, groups, or domains. Set viewer, commenter, or editor roles with just a few clicks.

searchFilter.title: Advanced Search & Filter
searchFilter.description: Quickly find files by name, type, or permission status. Filter by shared files, private files, or specific permission levels.

bulkActions.title: Bulk Actions
bulkActions.description: Select multiple files and apply permission changes in bulk. Save time by managing permissions for entire folders at once.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data stays with you. We don't store your files - all operations happen through secure OAuth authentication with Google.

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: See permission changes instantly. Our system keeps track of all modifications and provides real-time feedback.

items.visualize: View all files and their permissions in one place
items.identify: Identify who has access to sensitive documents
items.removeAccess: Remove permissions for former team members quickly
items.audit: Audit shared links and public files
items.bulkModify: Bulk modify permissions across multiple files

setup.heading: Setup Required
setup.description: To use this app, you need to configure Google OAuth credentials.
setup.step2: 2. Create a new project or select an existing one
setup.envNote: Then create a .env.local file with your credentials. See the README for details.

cta.heading: Ready to Take Control?
cta.description: Connect your Google Drive and start managing permissions in seconds. No installation required.

permissions.pageDescription: Manage permissions for your Google Drive files and folders

errors.failedToLoad: Failed to load files from Google Drive
errors.couldNotMap: Could not map your Google Drive files

addPermission.description: Add a new permission to this file or folder.

removePermission.title: Remove Permission
removePermission.description: Select a permission to remove from this file or folder.
removePermission.bulkDescription: This will remove permissions for {count} selected file(s).

viewPermissions.title: Permissions
viewPermissions.description: View all permissions for this file or folder.

loading.title: Mapping Your Drive
loading.description: We're scanning your Google Drive and building a map of your files and folders. This might take a moment depending on how many files you have.

noFiles.title: No Files Found
noFiles.description: Your Google Drive appears to be empty or we couldn't find any files. Try uploading some files to your Drive and refresh the page.

errorDialog.title: Mapping Failed
errorDialog.description: We couldn't map your Google Drive files.
